feed.title: Combined summary - Transcripts from Breaking Bitcoin 2019

entry.title: Combined summary - Transcripts from Breaking Bitcoin 2019
entry.summary: The Breaking Bitcoin 2019 conference was recently held, and Bryan took notes on the selected topics. Carl Dong gave an excellent talk on guix as a replacement for the gitian build system, with a link provided in the context. The conference covered several important topics, including mempool analysis, client-side filtering, client updates, privacy, and coinjoin talks, with transcripts available in the links provided.Hardware wallets were also discussed at the conference, with talks on extracting seeds from hardware wallets and the future of hardware wallets. Other topics included Bitcoin upgrades and p2pool analysis. The lightning network was discussed in detail, with talks on routing security, topological analysis, and security panel.Lastly, there was a talk on defense of bitcoin which might be of general interest. Overall, the conference covered a wide range of topics related to Bitcoin and highlighted some important developments in the field. Anyone interested in staying up-to-date on the latest in Bitcoin technology should definitely check out the resources provided in the context.
